title: New: Shlohmo – wen uuu (Teebs Remix)
content:
After Teebs’ lovely little album, Collection 01, dropped a few months ago, I was pretty fucking certain I would listen to anything that cat created. Sure there are limits, but the list was as long as my arm. K-pop, gothic soul, steam punk aquatic inspired folk; I’ll leave it there because the list is really long.

And now this, not exactly K-pop but I can forgive him for that. His re-work of the Shlohmo track ‘Wen uuu’ dissolves, melts and surrounds the consciousness. Each element of the track become beautifully harmonized entities, gracefully dancing around Shlohmo’s original work.

Via Breathing Beats.

Stream it below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
